fields.subject: Password reset for {username}
fields.body: Hello {username}, we received a request to reset your password. Use this link to proceed: {reset_link}

fields.subject: Your password was reset
fields.body: Hello {username}, your password has been changed successfully. If this was not you, please contact support immediately.

fields.subject: New order {order_number} received
fields.body: A new order {order_number} was placed for {company}.

fields.subject: Order {order_number} status updated
fields.body: Order {order_number} at {company} changed status from {previous_status} to {new_status}.
